title: Council Decision of 14 December 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 14 December 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training (98/C 405/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Mr A. R. KOOMEN is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training in place of Mr J. BOEVÉ for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 28 June 2001.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 December 1998
For the Council
The President
W. MOLTERER
(1) OJ L 167, 30.6.1975, p. 17.
(2) OJ C 222, 16.7.1998, p. 3.
